page.title: 05EDUCATION IN CURDWORTH
page.content: CURDWORTH FIRST SCHOOL IS SITUATED IN FARTHING LANE OFF COLESHILL ROAD. IT IS A MODERN BUILDING WITH ITS OWN PLAYING FIELD AT THE REAR. THE SCHOOL COMPRISES THREE CLASSROOMS, PRACTICAL AREA, P.E. HALL AND LIBRARY. AGES; FIVE YEARS OLD TO NINE YEARS OLD. NINE SUBJECTS ARE TAUGHT, INCLUDING LANGUAGE, MATHS, RELIGIOUS EDUCATION, P.E. MUSIC AND SCIENCE. OUT OF SCHOOL ACTIVITIES INCLUDE "HALF PAST EIGHT CLUB". OLDER CHILDREN GO TO KINGSBURY POOL FOR SWIMMING LESSONS. EVENING CLASSES IN LADIES KEEP FIT ARE HELD AT THE SCHOOL ON MONDAY EVENINGS AND YOGA CLASSES IN THE VILLAGE HALL ON TUESDAY EVENINGS. A PLAYGROUP IS HELD FOR PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN IN THE VILLAGE HALL, COLESHILL ROAD, CURDWORTH. CHILDREN OVER THE AGE OF NINE ATTEND WATER ORTON AND COLESHILL SCHOOLS.
